TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomLabel extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement implements class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IChartMapArea
Public Class CustomLabel Inherits ChartNamedElement Implements IChartMapArea
type CustomLabel = class inherit ChartNamedElement interface IChartMapArea

summary.span: 表示轴的自定义标签。

span.span: Represents a custom label for an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象存储在类，该类公开为属性类。 objects are stored in the class, which is exposed as the property of the class. 除非自定义标签使用指定的第一个标签行轴标签自动生成属性。Axis labels for the first label row are automatically generated unless custom labels are specified using the property. 如果指定了自定义标签沿第一个标签行，将为整个第一行自动不生成任何轴标签。If you specify a custom label along the first label row, no axis labels will be automatically generated for the entire first row. 仅自定义标签可能用于第二个标签行。Only custom labels may be used for the second label row. 和属性确定标签所应用到的轴范围。The and properties determine the axis range that the label applies to. 可以通过使用自定义轴标签的显示一个网格行和/或刻度线标记属性; 此属性指定是否将以自定义的网格线或刻度线标记绘制中间标签范围。A grid line and/or tick mark can be displayed for a custom axis label by using the property; this property specifies whether a custom grid line or tick mark will be drawn in the middle of the label range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。This constructor can be used to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 但是，建议你使用之一`Add`中的方法类添加自定义标签。However, it is recommended that you use one of the `Add` methods in the class to add custom labels.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double FromPosition { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.FromPosition : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义标签在轴坐标中的开始位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the beginning position, in axis coordinates, of the custom label.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示应用标签的轴范围的起点。

span.span: A value that represents the beginning of the axis range that the label is applied to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定标签应用到的轴范围的开始位置。The property determines the start position of the axis range the label is applied to. 值之间的差异和属性确定将在其中的标签文本显示。The difference between the values of the and properties determines where the label text will be displayed. 例如，假设的 x 轴具有小数位数，范围为 1 到 5 （1、 2、 3、 4、 5）。For example, suppose the X-axis has a scale that ranges from 1 to 5 (1, 2 ,3 , 4, 5). 为了显示下面的第二个点的自定义标签，则会将设置属性设置为 1.5 和到 2.5 的属性。In order to display a custom label just underneath the second point, you would set the property to 1.5 and the property to 2.5. 如果— 或，具体取决于相关的轴于-设置为值，则此属性将显示为设计器中的值。If the —or , depending on the axis in question—is set to a value, then this property will be displayed as a value in the designer. 此属性不应设置为相同的值属性。This property should not be set to the same value as the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelMarkStyle LabelMark { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelMarkStyle get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelMarkStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义标签的标签标记。

span.span: Gets or sets the label mark for a custom label.

summary.span: 这仅适用于第二行中的标签。

span.span: This applies to labels in the second row only.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定要使用的标签标记的类型（如果有）。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the type of label mark, if any, to be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标签标记仅用于第二行的标签，并通常到组标签一起使用从第一行。Label marks can only be used for the second row of labels, and are usually used to group labels together from the first row. 主要刻度线的线条样式的相关对象用于标记，例如，AxisX.MajorTickMark.LineDashStyle 属性的行模式。The major tick mark's line style of the relevant object is used for the line pattern of the mark, for example, the AxisX.MajorTickMark.LineDashStyle property.

member this.RowIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义标签行的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the custom label row.

value.span: 一个 值，该值指定自定义标签行的索引（从 0 到 10）。

span.span: An value that specifies the index, 0 to 10, of the custom label row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定的行标签是行标签与轴与 10 进一步的大多数轴标签最接近零的索引。The property specifies the index of the row label where zero is the row label closest to the axis to ten, the further most axis label. 仅自定义标签可以用于以外的第一行的标签行。Only custom labels can be used for the label rows beyond the first row. 如果自定义标签用于第一个行，将自动保存功能。 不会生成整个轴标签在这种情况下，所有标签的第一行然后都必须自定义标签。If a custom label is used for the first row, labels for that entire axis will not be generated automatically; in this case, all labels for the first row must then be custom labels.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Text : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义标签文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom label text.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示标签文本。

span.span: A value that represents the label text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置的标签文本对象。The property gets or sets the label text of the object. 请注意，第一个标签行的轴标签自动生成的但可以使用重写对象。Note that axis labels for the first label row are generated automatically, but can be overridden using objects. 如果指定了自定义标签沿第一个轴行，将为整个第一行自动不生成任何轴标签。If you specify a custom label along the first axis row, no axis labels will be automatically generated for the entire first row.
